data.text:
Rose Tremain's novels and short stories have been published in 30 countries and have won several awards, including the Orange Prize (The Road Home) and the Whitbread Novel of the Year (Music & Silence). Her stories transport readers through time and space, and she has created some of contemporary literature's best-loved and most memorable characters.

To celebrate her new novel, Absolutely & Forever, we've created a guide to help you find your perfect place to begin.
